npcMessage.comment: This time the price will be %DI credits, which is a complete bargain.  Prices might go up next week, so you should think about buying right now!

playerMessage.comment: Those prices are criminal!  I don't think so.
WHAT!?!?  Jabba The Hutt has better deals than that...but okay.  I'll take it
